verses.name: Acts 13:34
verses.text: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead, now no more to return to corruption, he said on this wise, I will give you the sure mercies of David.

verses.name: Acts 13:35
verses.text: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm, Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.

verses.name: Acts 13:36
verses.text: For David, after he had served his own generation by the will of God, fell on sleep, and was laid unto his fathers, and saw corruption:

verses.name: Acts 13:37
verses.text: But he, whom God raised again, saw no corruption.
